review: Although I ultimately liked the product I purchased it for my Mother due to the alleged easy set up.  The problem was an extremly limited installation manual and virtually nothing about how to connect with such sites as Netflix.  If this (and some other popular sites) had already been loaded ( like in Roku)I would have given this 5 stars.  It was not an easy installation because I had to discover (by going on line) how to add what turned out to be "apps". Now that it works I am very pleased...but not an easy installation.
